welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Luis, Argentina! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this beautiful city, known for its stunning natural landscapes, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that San Luis has to offer.

restaurants.name: Beach House, Costa Pacifica

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at San Luis Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight at San Luis Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
